originalText.text: I am a new patient of Dr. Jackson's and I was put at such ease immediately. She is so calming, patient, and knowledgeable. She really listened and offered helpful solutions to my pain concerns. I have a lot of back, shoulder and neck pain that felt so much better after my appointment with her. Her office is so clean and inviting. She makes sure the temperature is just right and it honestly felt spa like laying on her heated table. I can't wait to return!

originalText.text: I have been seeing this Dr since I came to NYC. Then Cabrini shut down I only ha do the worst Drs. I have for the last 5 years reunited. She is amazing tentative. Care about her Patients. Her goal is to keep us out of the Hospital and keep us healthy. I am blessed to have her in my life. She doesn't always jump to medication. She does use it.  but works with natural for instance.i was having high blood and cholesterol with her knowledge and expertise my blood pressure back when I was a kid teaching eronics andmy cholesterol is back to normal no meds natural. Love her their no wonder her Dr score is a five

originalText.text: Wonderful doctor! My husband and I both see her and have been for years- we just love her. She’s calm and relaxed but she really knows her stuff. She focuses on things that matter and she really listens to her patients. Always willing to track down an excellent specialist if you need a recommendation and easy to schedule appointments. She treats you like a human being she cares about. She’s absolutely lovely.

text.text: Wonderful doctor! My husband and I both see her and have been for years- we just love her. She’s calm and relaxed but she really knows her stuff. originalText.text: I have been going to Dr. Jackson for 10 years. She is a wonderful doctor. She is patient, listens and never makes you feel rushed. I just recommended her to a colleague of mine, who felt when she's with you, she is really "in the moment," i.e. attentive to your needs. I agree wholeheartedly and try to recommend her, whenever the opportunity arises.

originalText.text: Dr. Jackson is the best doctor I've had. She cares more than any doctor I've ever known, is always looking into things if she doesn't understand what's going on. When I had to go into the hospital for 10 days, she stopped by every day to check in on me, see how I was doing, if I had questions, what the care was like. What doctor does that these days? If you're looking for a doctor, Dr. Jackson is the best!
